Index.title: Chat Simplifier
Index.slogan: Too many group messages? It's too long to look!
Index.placeholder: Choose more chat content and copy it. It usually contains nicknames and content.
Index.step2: Select the form of the output.
Index.privacyPolicy1: It is not recommended to upload chat that is too private. For more information, please see
Index.paragraphFormPrompt: You will receive a chat record and we hope you can summarize it. Please provide a brief summary in one paragraph.
Index.outlineFormPrompt: You will receive a chat record and we hope you can summarize it. Please provide a concise outline format that includes a list.
Index.timeoutError: Request timed out, please try again later
Index.internalServerError: Internal server error, please try again later
